requirementSummary: BlueWave Technologies requires a virtual full-stack development training program for its engineering team. The training will focus on building scalable web applications using React for the frontend and Node.js with Express for backend services. The objective is to upskill developers on modern UI development, REST API creation, authentication, and deployment best practices.

typeSpecificDetails.trainingName: Full Stack Web Development using React & Node.js
typeSpecificDetails.trainingRequirement: Full Stack Web Development using React & Node.js

commonDetails.courseName: Full Stack Web Development using React & Node.js
